title: "I have raised jungles, shaped lands and commanded rivers...."

replies.body:
{{champion:136}} I have forged stars, shaped planets and fed enemy yasuo 10 kills in 5 minutes
{{champion:82}} I have built great empire, even greater afterlife and lost turret at 5 minutes

> [{quoted}](name=Velzard of Koz,realm=EUNE,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=PZ8MMHpg,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-06-06T19:03:28.735+0000)
>
> {{champion:136}} I have forged stars, shaped planets and fed enemy yasuo 10 kills in 5 minutes
> {{champion:82}} I have built great empire, even greater afterlife and lost turret at 5 minutes

u mean morde got the enemy ghost and took turret at 5 mins
Sol didnt shape planets lol.

> [{quoted}](name=Terozu,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=PZ8MMHpg,comment-id=00000001,timestamp=2019-06-06T20:34:32.089+0000)
>
> Sol didnt shape planets lol.

Look, he's been having a really tough few centuries, just give him this one, okay?

He can have the destruction of Runeterra once hes freed himself.

Until then we make him suffer so the distruction is justified.

ðŸ‘Œ

No, you're right.

He created the stars which's continous implosions and recreations would come down to forging a heat cycle that cooled down raw matter in the right distance to a point where it was able to sustain life.

Aurelion didn't just forge planets, he created the very conditions required for them to exist in the first place.
No, he and many other star dragons just created stars.  Runeterra was created via the world runes by some unknown precursor who decided to create an oblate spheroid planet.

Considering the way a Solar system works, pretty sure Runeterra would be just a molten rock or an icecube without a Sun and the proper conditions.

The argument lies within how creating a star validates having created the planets around it. Planets can't exist without a sun. Pretty sure aside from magic and National mentalities, Runeterra functions like any other real world, astronomy included.

In LoL stars are made by giant 2 mile tall dragons and start off 12 feet tall.

Science doesn't really apply.

Especially since if anything whatever made Sol made him and his race to create sun's for the planets it was gonna make.

She's opposing the faction clear-cutting the forest, and apparently in other languages she uses a word that means "grown," so probably not.
{{champion:240}} So...whatchu doin' on mah properteh? Waitin' to git shot?
"I've had summoners complain that im too attractive as a female on the rift and that I should look more like they do IRL"
